sentences.en: a competition for physically challenged athletes
children who have been physically abused
Depression may be expressed physically too.
sentences.cn: 抑郁症也会表现在身体状况上。

sentences.en: Do you find him physically attractive?
Dr. Johnson and I have been trying to build him up physically.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊医生和我一直试图增强他的体质。

sentences.en: He looked physically very powerful, athletic in a compact way.
sentences.cn: 他看上去非常强壮，像个敦实的运动员。

sentences.en: He was not perhaps physically the strongest in the class.
sentences.cn: 他可能不是全班身体最壮的。

sentences.en: I felt physically sick at the thought.
sentences.cn: 一想到那个我就觉得身体不舒服。

sentences.en: I like John but I don't find him attractive physically.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢约翰，不过我认为他长得并不英俊。

sentences.en: If he wasn't there physically, he was always in her thoughts.
sentences.cn: 就算他人不在那儿,他也总在她的心里.

sentences.en: She is young and physically fit.
She was physically delicate and psy-chologically unstable.
sentences.cn: 她身体孱弱，心理上也不够稳定。

sentences.en: Teachers were threatened with kitchen knives, physically assaulted and verbally abused..
sentences.cn: .老师们被人用菜刀威胁，遭受人身侵犯和言语辱骂。

sentences.en: The dampness of the forest did not agree with him physically.
sentences.cn: 他的身体不能适应森林的潮湿。
这工作需要有很好的体力。

sentences.en: This work is physically exhausting and emotionally draining.
sentences.cn: 这项工作让人身心交瘁。

sentences.en: We had to physically wrestle the child from the man's arms.
sentences.cn: 我们只得用力把孩子从那个男子手中夺过来。

sentences.en: You may be physically and mentally exhausted after a long flight.
sentences.cn: 长途飞行后，你可能会感到身心疲惫。

sentences.en: You will learn what to expect as your child matures physically.
sentences.cn: 在孩子身体发育成熟时，你就知道会发生什么事了。

words.tran_cn: [物] 物理的；身体的；物质的

phrases.tran_cn: 不安的，担心的；不舒服的

trans.tran_cn: 身体上，依据自然规律，按自然规律；根本上，实际上
trans.tran_en: in relation to your body rather than your mind or emotions
